## Fit the model

Now we're ready to fit the model


```{r}
?fdmr::fit_model
```

```{r}
model_output <- fdmr::fit_model(y="datn", data=dataset, process_coords=locations, time_variable="time")
```

Now we can have a look at some of the model output
